ValidationRule.description: Ensures an End User Account is attached and Reseller is named to opportunity before a SPA can be requested
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: or(and( Distributor_Account__c = true, End_User_Company__c = null, End_User_Lookup_Account__c = null),and( Distributor_Account__c = true, End_User_Lookup_Account__c = null, StateLookup__c = null ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add a End User to "End User Lookup Account". If you could not locate the End User account, please add to End User Company (Text) and the End User State.
